codeSystems.name: AdministrationDevice
codeSystems.title: EDQM Administration Device
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Administration device from EDQM, DEV, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: AdministrationMethod
codeSystems.title: EDQM Administration Method
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Administration method from EDQM, AME, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: AllUnits
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR All Units Combined
codeSystems.description: Value set for presentation strength denominator unit, combines units of measurement and units of presentation.

codeSystems.name: SporAtc
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR ATC
codeSystems.description: Value set for Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical classification system Human and Veterinary. It combines 2 SPOR/WHO lists

codeSystems.name: AuthorisedDoseForm
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Authorised Dose Form
codeSystems.description: Value set for authorised dose form. Combines 4 SPOR/EDQM lists: Pharmaceutical dose form, Combined pharmaceutical dose form, Combined term, Combination package.

codeSystems.name: BasicDoseForm
codeSystems.title: EDQM Basic Dose Form
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Basic dose form from EDQM, BDF, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: Closure
codeSystems.title: EDQM Closure
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Closure (for package description) from EDQM, CLO, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: CombinationPack
codeSystems.title: EDQM Combination Pack
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Combination pack (dose form) from EDQM, CMP, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: CombinedPharmaceuticalDoseForm
codeSystems.title: EDQM Combined Pharmaceutical Dose Form
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Combined pharmaceutical dose form from EDQM, CDF, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: CombinedTerm
codeSystems.title: EDQM Combined Term
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Combined term (dose form) from EDQM, CMT, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: Container
codeSystems.title: EDQM Container
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Container (package type) from EDQM, CON, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: CountryEMA
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Country
codeSystems.description: Countries. EMA SPOR RMS list.

codeSystems.name: CountryISO
codeSystems.title: Country (ISO 3166-1-2)
codeSystems.description: Countries

codeSystems.name: Domain
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Domain
codeSystems.description: Domain of the medicinal product. EMA SPOR RMS list.

codeSystems.name: EhdsiUcumUnit
codeSystems.title: MyHealth@EU Unit of Measurement (UCUM)
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for units based on UCUM to be used in MyHealth@EU crossborder services

codeSystems.name: IntendedSite
codeSystems.title: EDQM Intended Site
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Intended site from EDQM, ISI, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: LanguageBCP
codeSystems.title: Language (FHIR)
codeSystems.description: All languages

codeSystems.name: LanguageEMA
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Language
codeSystems.description: Languages. EMA SPOR RMS list.

codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Legal Status for the Supply
codeSystems.description: EMA SPOR RMS list

codeSystems.name: SporMarketingStatus
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Marketing Status
codeSystems.description: Marketing Status

codeSystems.name: Material
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Material
codeSystems.description: Package material. EMA SPOR RMS LIST.

codeSystems.name: PackagingCategory
codeSystems.title: EDQM Packaging Category
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Packaging category from EDQM, PAC, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: SporPackaging
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Packaging
codeSystems.description: Packaging

codeSystems.name: PatientFriendlyTerm
codeSystems.title: EDQM Patient-friendly Term
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Patient-friendly term (dose forms) from EDQM, PFT, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: PharmaceuticalDoseForm
codeSystems.title: EDQM Pharmaceutical Dose Form
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Pharmaceutical dose form from EDQM, PDF, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: PharmaceuticalDoseForm
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Pharmaceutical Dose Form
codeSystems.description: Pharmaceutical dose form. Does not include combination dose forms.

codeSystems.name: SporRecordStatus
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Record Status
codeSystems.description: Value set for record status.

codeSystems.name: SporRegulatoryStatus
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Regulatory Entitlement Status
codeSystems.description: Regulatory Entitlement Status

codeSystems.name: RouteOfAdministration
codeSystems.title: EDQM Route of Administration
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Route of administration from EDQM, ROA, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: RoutesAndMethodsOfAdministration
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Routes and Methods of Administration
codeSystems.description: Routes and methods of medication administration. EMA SPOR RMS list, based on EDQM.

codeSystems.name: SporShelfLifeType
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Shelf Life Type
codeSystems.description: Shelf Life Type

codeSystems.name: SubstancesSMS
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR SMS Substances
codeSystems.description: Value set for substances, PPL subset from SMS.

codeSystems.name: UnitOfMeasurement
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Unit of Measurement
codeSystems.description: Units of measurement. EMA SPOR RMS list based on UCUM.

codeSystems.name: UnitOfPresentation
codeSystems.title: EDQM Unit of Presentation
codeSystems.description: ValueSet Unit of presentation from EDQM, UOP, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

codeSystems.name: UnitOfPresentation
codeSystems.title: EMA SPOR Unit of Presentation
codeSystems.description: Units of presentation. EMA SPOR RMS list based on EDQM.

codeSystems.name: VsWhoAtcUnicom
codeSystems.title: WHO ATC
codeSystems.description: World Health Organization Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system.  Note: The currently implemented code system and the value set expansion contain only a set of example ATC codes, not the complete code system content.
